sentence.Network_en: Many words once commonly used have fallen into desuetude.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense cessation): from French, from Latin desuetudo, from desuet- 'made unaccustomed', from the verb desuescere, from de- (expressing reversal) + suescere 'be accustomed'

means.word_mean: 1. a state of inactivity or disuse
